Package game.Items

Class Egg

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.Items.Egg
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllosaurEgg, BrachiosaurEgg, PterodactylEgg, StegosaurEgg
public abstract class Egg
extends Item
An abstract class which holds all the behaviours for an egg

      displayChar - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground

      Description copied from class: Item
